column5: Guess this means you will have to cut your ice fishing videos short this year?!!!

Jeebus! Tell me about it bruvva! Its brutal.....this was me 2 days ago waiting for a bite. But I have a plan! Every year we escape to Antigua in the Caribbean. Of course I take a rod or 2 and enough tackle to open a shop. I go out early every morning for 2 weeks exploring the rocky shores and mangrove bays armed with a 7' heavy action St. Croix and assorted hard/softbaits. In just over a week i'll be doing this again!!!!!VIDEOS FROM PREVIOUS ANTIGUA TRIPShttps://www.youtube.com/playlist?lis...HwF2KR6oaj3Yan

Greetings, I liked Bearfvr's original post. I liked Limey's reply even better. I have a hunch that the thought going through your head when the picture taken was as follows: "I wonder if I left the beer outside too long?". Kindest Regards....
